name: mrhistmatch
description:
Modify the intensities of one image to match the histogram of another.



References:

* If using inverse contrast normalization for inter-modal (DWI - T1) registration:
Bhushan, C.; Haldar, J. P.; Choi, S.; Joshi, A. A.; Shattuck, D. W. & Leahy, R. M. Co-registration and distortion correction of diffusion and anatomical images based on inverse contrast normalization. NeuroImage, 2015, 115, 269-280
author: MRTrix3 Developers

inputs.name: type
inputs.description: type of histogram matching to perform; options are: scale,linear,nonlinear

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: the input image to be modified

inputs.name: target
inputs.description: the input image from which to derive the target histogram

inputs.name: mask_input
inputs.description: only generate input histogram based on a specified binary mask image

inputs.name: mask_target
inputs.description: only generate target histogram based on a specified binary mask image

inputs.name: bins
inputs.description: the number of bins to use to generate the histograms

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.
